titleStmt.title: Marie Magdalens lamentations for the losse of her master Iesus
titleStmt.author: Markham, Gervase, 1568?-1637.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Adam Islip for Edward White, and are to be sold at his shop, dwelling at the little north dore of Paules, at the signe of the Gun,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop, dwelling at the little north dore of Paules, at the signe of the Gun
